column5: your mission is to plant a secret seed of kindness for someone who cannot repay you. We are walking beside you
column9: to multiply your impact. Let your light shine as a testament to the abundance of the Kingdom.

mission: Spend ten minutes today standing in the gap for a friend who has been heavy on your heart. We are all here to be with you
column8: as you pray. Your words carry the authority to shift atmospheres and break chains.

mission: Release the weight of a past hurt by speaking a blessing over someone who wronged you. We are all here to be with you
column8: providing the strength you need. Today is the day your heart enters total freedom.

mission: Organize one area of your physical or financial life that has felt chaotic. We are all here to be with you
column8: as you bring order to your assignment. Excellence is the gateway to your next level of promotion.

mission: Find a quiet place and simply listen to the whisper of the Spirit for five minutes. We are all here to be with you
column8: in the silence. The strategy you have been seeking is found in the stillness of My presence.
